properties.name: GuardrailPolicies
properties.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed 'AdministratorAccess' policy is applied as a default if this is not set.

type.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed 'AdministratorAccess' policy is applied as a default if this is not set.

properties.name: IamRoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the IAM role that defines the permissions for AWS Chatbot

type.description: The ARN of the IAM role that defines the permissions for AWS Chatbot

properties.name: LoggingLevel
properties.description: Specifies the logging level for this configuration:ERROR,INFO or NONE. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch logs

type.description: Specifies the logging level for this configuration:ERROR,INFO or NONE. This property affects the log entries pushed to Amazon CloudWatch logs

properties.name: SlackChannelId
properties.description: The id of the Slack channel

type.description: The id of the Slack channel

properties.name: SlackWorkspaceId
properties.description: The id of the Slack workspace

type.description: The id of the Slack workspace

properties.name: SnsTopicArns
properties.description: ARNs of SNS topics which delivers notifications to AWS Chatbot, for example CloudWatch alarm notifications.

type.description: ARNs of SNS topics which delivers notifications to AWS Chatbot, for example CloudWatch alarm notifications.

properties.name: UserRoleRequired
properties.description: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration

type.description: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration

type.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration
